description: ## Overview Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow via the `DisableDevice` function. An attacker can cause an application crash or potentially execute arbitrary code in SSH X11 forwarding environments by exploiting this vulnerability. ## Remediation Upgrade `xorg-server` to version 21.1.11, 23.2.4 or higher. ## References - [Gitlab Commit](https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/xorg/xserver/-/commit/42f8d1828b4fc1e0b8165a767a0b74edcdbf3806) - [Gitlab Commit](https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/xorg/xserver/-/commit/5c4816afa7722ea47d1a7dea983a953e7b454d26) - [RedHat Bugzilla Bug](https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2256542)
remediation: Upgrade xorg-server to version 21.1.11, 23.2.4 or higher.
title: Heap-based Buffer Overflow
